title: Russia responsible for chemical attack: Haley
text:
Russia responsible for chemical attack: Haley 8:26pm GMT - 01:40 
U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Nikki Haley said on Wednesday the United States believes Russia is responsible for a chemical attack in Britain on a former Russia double agent and his daughter, and the U.N. Security Council should take action. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Nikki Haley said on Wednesday the United States believes Russia is responsible for a chemical attack in Britain on a former Russia double agent and his daughter, and the U.N. Security Council should take action. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2pdXedi
